titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Rashid Family Club of America Records, 1979-1980.
titlestmt.author: Finding aid created by Immigration History Research Center staff, May 12, 1987

did.unittitle: Rashid Family Club of America Records,
did.repository: University of Minnesota Libraries. Immigration History Research Center [ihrc]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Reunion booklet (1979) and newspaper clippings of the Rashid Family Club of America, for a reunion of the Rashid family. Included are letters from President Jimmy Carter and entertainer Danny Thomas. The Rashids are a Lebanese American family, five members of which came to the United States in 1896. They settled in Detroit, Iowa, and Illinois.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the catalog of the University of Minnesota Libraries. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons or places should search the catalog using these headings.
controlaccess.subject: Lebanese Americans.
Lebanese Americans--Iowa.
Lebanese Americans--Illinois.
Lebanese Americans--Michigan--Detroit.
